name: Woody 88: Block Puzzle Games
description:
If you like an innovative puzzle concept to relax after a long day or excise the concentration, then you'll get a kick out of WOODY 88: BLOCK PUZZLE GAMES as well.
WOODY 88: BLOCK PUZZLE GAMES is a rare masterpiece of a puzzle game, which combines interesting and fairly unique gameplay with a vintage nautical theme. This 8-in-1 block puzzle has you simply drag the given blocks to fill up and clear the 8 outer squares to get a high score! Once you complete a square, you will be rewarded with a single block to help you easily get the streak scores.
If you are interested, then you should first read out the features of this game, given below.
Vintage nautical theme
No time limit
No Wi-fi? No Problem!
Challenge yourself!
Boost brain power
Free & Simple
Carving out time and having a blast playing WOODY 88: BLOCK PUZZLE GAMES now for free.
